Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 15: by the hands of angel-scribes | بايدي سفرة
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 16: honourable and virtuous. | كرام بررة
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 17: Condemned are ˹disbelieving˺ humans! How ungrateful they are ˹to Allah˺! | قتل الانسان ما اكفره
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 18: From what substance did He create them? | من اي شيء خلقه
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 19: He created them from a sperm-drop, and ordained their development. | من نطفة خلقه فقدره
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 20: Then He makes the way easy for them | ثم السبيل يسره
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 21: then causes them to die and be buried. | ثم اماته فاقبره
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 22: Then when He wills, He will resurrect them. | ثم اذا شاء انشره
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 23: But no! They have failed to comply with what He ordered. | كلا لما يقض ما امره
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 24: Let people then consider their food: | فلينظر الانسان الى طعامه
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 25: how We pour down rain in abundance | انا صببنا الماء صبا
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 26: and meticulously split the earth open ˹for sprouts˺ | ثم شققنا الارض شقا
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 27: causing grain to grow in it | فانبتنا فيها حبا
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 28: as well as grapes and greens | وعنبا وقضبا
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 29: and olives and palm trees | وزيتونا ونخلا
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 30: and dense orchards | وحدائق غلبا
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 31: and fruit and fodder— | وفاكهة وابا
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 32: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals. | متاعا لكم ولانعامكم
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 33: Then, when the Deafening Blast comes to pass— | فاذا جاءت الصاخة
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 34: on that Day every person will flee from their own siblings | يوم يفر المرء من اخيه
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 35: and ˹even˺ their mother and father | وامه وابيه
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 36: and ˹even˺ their spouse and children. | وصاحبته وبنيه
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 37: For then everyone will have enough concern of their own. | لكل امرئ منهم يومئذ شان يغنيه
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 38: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright | وجوه يومئذ مسفرة
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 39: laughing and rejoicing | ضاحكة مستبشرة
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 40: while ˹other˺ faces will be dusty | ووجوه يومئذ عليها غبرة
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 41: cast in gloom— | ترهقها قترة
Surah 80 Abasa, Ayah 42: those are the disbelievers, the ˹wicked˺ sinners. | اولئك هم الكفرة الفجرة
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 1: When the sun is put out | اذا الشمس كورت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 2: and when the stars fall down | واذا النجوم انكدرت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 3: and when the mountains are blown away | واذا الجبال سيرت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 4: and when pregnant camels are left untended | واذا العشار عطلت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 5: and when wild beasts are gathered together | واذا الوحوش حشرت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 6: and when the seas are set on fire | واذا البحار سجرت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 7: and when the souls ˹and their bodies˺ are paired ˹once more˺ | واذا النفوس زوجت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 8: and when baby girls, buried alive, are asked | واذا الموءودة سئلت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 9: for what crime they were put to death | باي ذنب قتلت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 10: and when the records ˹of deeds˺ are laid open | واذا الصحف نشرت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 11: and when the sky is stripped away | واذا السماء كشطت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 12: and when the Hellfire is fiercely flared up | واذا الجحيم سعرت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 13: and when Paradise is brought near— | واذا الجنة ازلفت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 14: ˹on that Day˺ each soul will know what ˹deeds˺ it has brought along. | علمت نفس ما احضرت
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 15: I do swear by the receding stars | فلا اقسم بالخنس
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 16: which travel and hide | الجوار الكنس
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 17: and the night as it falls | والليل اذا عسعس
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 18: and the day as it breaks! | والصبح اذا تنفس
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 19: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the Word of ˹Allah delivered by Gabriel,˺ a noble messenger-angel | انه لقول رسول كريم
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 20: full of power, held in honour by the Lord of the Throne | ذي قوة عند ذي العرش مكين
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 21: obeyed there ˹in heaven˺, and trustworthy. | مطاع ثم امين
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 22: And your fellow man is not insane. | وما صاحبكم بمجنون
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 23: And he did see that ˹angel˺ on the clear horizon | ولقد راه بالافق المبين
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 24: and he does not withhold ˹what is revealed to him of˺ the unseen. | وما هو على الغيب بضنين
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 25: And this ˹Quran˺ is not the word of an outcast devil. | وما هو بقول شيطان رجيم
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 26: So what ˹other˺ path would you take? | فاين تذهبون
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 27: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is only a reminder to the whole world— | ان هو الا ذكر للعالمين
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 28: to whoever of you wills to take the Straight Way. | لمن شاء منكم ان يستقيم
Surah 81 At-Takwir, Ayah 29: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺, except by the Will of Allah, the Lord of all worlds. | وما تشاءون الا ان يشاء الله رب العالمين
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 1: When the sky splits open | اذا السماء انفطرت
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 2: and when the stars fall away | واذا الكواكب انتثرت
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 3: and when the seas burst forth | واذا البحار فجرت
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 4: and when the graves spill out | واذا القبور بعثرت
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 5: ˹then˺ each soul will know what it has sent forth or left behind. | علمت نفس ما قدمت واخرت
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 6: O humanity! What has emboldened you against your Lord, the Most Generous | يا ايها الانسان ما غرك بربك الكريم
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 7: Who created you, fashioned you, and perfected your design | الذي خلقك فسواك فعدلك
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 8: moulding you in whatever form He willed? | في اي صورة ما شاء ركبك
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 9: But no! In fact, you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment | كلا بل تكذبون بالدين
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 10: while you are certainly observed by vigilant | وان عليكم لحافظين
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 11: honourable angels, recording ˹everything˺. | كراما كاتبين
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 12: They know whatever you do. | يعلمون ما تفعلون
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 13: Indeed, the virtuous will be in bliss | ان الابرار لفي نعيم
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 14: and the wicked will be in Hell | وان الفجار لفي جحيم
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 15: burning in it on Judgment Day | يصلونها يوم الدين
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 16: and they will have no escape from it. | وما هم عنها بغائبين
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 17: What will make you realize what Judgment Day is? | وما ادراك ما يوم الدين
Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 18: Again, what will make you realize what Judgment Day is? | ثم ما ادراك ما يوم الدين

Surah 82 Al-Infitaar, Ayah 19: ˹It is˺ the Day no soul will be of ˹any˺ benefit to another whatsoever, for all authority on that Day belongs to Allah ˹entirely˺. | يوم لا تملك نفس لنفس شيئا والامر يومئذ لله
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 1: Woe to the defrauders! | ويل للمطففين
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 2: Those who take full measure ˹when they buy˺ from people | الذين اذا اكتالوا على الناس يستوفون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 3: but give less when they measure or weigh for buyers. | واذا كالوهم او وزنوهم يخسرون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 4: Do such people not think that they will be resurrected | الا يظن اولئك انهم مبعوثون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 5: for a tremendous Day— | ليوم عظيم
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 6: the Day ˹all˺ people will stand before the Lord of all worlds? | يوم يقوم الناس لرب العالمين
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 7: But no! The wicked are certainly bound for Sijjîn ˹in the depths of Hell˺— | كلا ان كتاب الفجار لفي سجين
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 8: and what will make you realize what Sijjîn is?— | وما ادراك ما سجين
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 9: a fate ˹already˺ sealed. | كتاب مرقوم
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 10: Woe on that Day to the deniers— | ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 11: those who deny Judgment Day! | الذين يكذبون بيوم الدين
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 12: None would deny it except every evildoing transgressor. | وما يكذب به الا كل معتد اثيم
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 13: Whenever Our revelations are recited to them, they say, “Ancient fables!” | اذا تتلى عليه اياتنا قال اساطير الاولين
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 14: But no! In fact, their hearts have been stained by all ˹the evil˺ they used to commit! | كلا بل ران على قلوبهم ما كانوا يكسبون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 15: Undoubtedly, they will be sealed off from their Lord on that Day. | كلا انهم عن ربهم يومئذ لمحجوبون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 16: Moreover, they will surely burn in Hell | ثم انهم لصالو الجحيم
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 17: and then be told, “This is what you used to deny.” | ثم يقال هذا الذي كنتم به تكذبون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 18: But no! The virtuous are certainly bound for ’Illiyûn ˹in elevated Gardens˺— | كلا ان كتاب الابرار لفي عليين
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 19: and what will make you realize what ’Illiyûn is?— | وما ادراك ما عليون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 20: a fate ˹already˺ sealed | كتاب مرقوم
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 21: witnessed by those nearest ˹to Allah˺. | يشهده المقربون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 22: Surely the virtuous will be in bliss | ان الابرار لفي نعيم
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 23: ˹seated˺ on ˹canopied˺ couches, gazing around. | على الارائك ينظرون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 24: You will recognize on their faces the glow of delight. | تعرف في وجوههم نضرة النعيم
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 25: They will be given a drink of sealed, pure wine | يسقون من رحيق مختوم
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 26: whose last sip will smell like musk. So let whoever aspires to this strive ˹diligently˺. | ختامه مسك وفي ذلك فليتنافس المتنافسون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 27: And this drink’s flavour will come from Tasnîm— | ومزاجه من تسنيم
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 28: a spring from which those nearest ˹to Allah˺ will drink. | عينا يشرب بها المقربون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 29: Indeed, the wicked used to laugh at the believers | ان الذين اجرموا كانوا من الذين امنوا يضحكون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 30: wink to one another whenever they passed by | واذا مروا بهم يتغامزون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 31: and muse ˹over these exploits˺ upon returning to their own people. | واذا انقلبوا الى اهلهم انقلبوا فكهين
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 32: And when they saw the faithful, they would say, “These ˹people˺ are truly astray,” | واذا راوهم قالوا ان هؤلاء لضالون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 33: even though they were not sent as keepers over the believers. | وما ارسلوا عليهم حافظين
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 34: But on that Day the believers will be laughing at the disbelievers | فاليوم الذين امنوا من الكفار يضحكون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 35: as they sit on ˹canopied˺ couches, looking on. | على الارائك ينظرون
Surah 83 Al-Mutaffifin, Ayah 36: ˹The believers will be asked,˺ “Have the disbelievers ˹not˺ been paid back for what they used to do?” | هل ثوب الكفار ما كانوا يفعلون
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 1: When the sky bursts open | اذا السماء انشقت
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 2: obeying its Lord as it must | واذنت لربها وحقت
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 3: and when the earth is flattened out | واذا الارض مدت
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 4: and ejects ˹all˺ its contents and becomes empty | والقت ما فيها وتخلت
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 5: obeying its Lord as it must, ˹surely you will all be judged˺. | واذنت لربها وحقت
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 6: O humanity! Indeed, you are labouring restlessly towards your Lord, and will ˹eventually˺ meet the consequences. | يا ايها الانسان انك كادح الى ربك كدحا فملاقيه
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 7: As for those who are given their record in their right hand | فاما من اوتي كتابه بيمينه
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 8: they will have an easy reckoning | فسوف يحاسب حسابا يسيرا
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 9: and will return to their people joyfully. | وينقلب الى اهله مسرورا
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 10: And as for those who are given their record ˹in their left hand˺ from behind their backs | واما من اوتي كتابه وراء ظهره
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 11: they will cry for ˹instant˺ destruction | فسوف يدعو ثبورا
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 12: and will burn in the blazing Fire. | ويصلى سعيرا
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 13: For they used to be prideful among their people | انه كان في اهله مسرورا
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 14: thinking they would never return ˹to Allah˺. | انه ظن ان لن يحور
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 15: Yes ˹they would˺! Surely their Lord has always been All-Seeing of them. | بلى ان ربه كان به بصيرا
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 16: So, I do swear by the twilight! | فلا اقسم بالشفق
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 17: And by the night and whatever it envelops! | والليل وما وسق
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 18: And by the moon when it waxes full! | والقمر اذا اتسق
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 19: You will certainly pass from one state to another. | لتركبن طبقا عن طبق
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 20: So what is the matter with them that they do not believe | فما لهم لا يؤمنون
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 21: and when the Quran is recited to them, they do not bow down ˹in submission˺? | واذا قرئ عليهم القران لا يسجدون
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 22: In fact, the disbelievers persist in denial. | بل الذين كفروا يكذبون
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 23: But Allah knows best whatever they hide. | والله اعلم بما يوعون
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 24: So give them good news of a painful punishment. | فبشرهم بعذاب اليم
Surah 84 Al-Inshiqaaq, Ayah 25: But those who believe and do good will have a never-ending reward. | الا الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم اجر غير ممنون
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 1: By the sky full of constellations | والسماء ذات البروج
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 2: and the promised Day ˹of Judgment˺ | واليوم الموعود
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 3: and the witness and what is witnessed! | وشاهد ومشهود
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 4: Condemned are the makers of the ditch— | قتل اصحاب الاخدود
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 5: the fire ˹pit˺, filled with fuel— | النار ذات الوقود
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 6: when they sat around it | اذ هم عليها قعود
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 7: watching what they had ˹ordered to be˺ done to the believers | وهم على ما يفعلون بالمؤمنين شهود
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 8: who they resented for no reason other than belief in Allah—the Almighty, the Praiseworthy— | وما نقموا منهم الا ان يؤمنوا بالله العزيز الحميد
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 9: ˹the One˺ to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and earth. And Allah is a Witness over all things. | الذي له ملك السماوات والارض والله على كل شيء شهيد

Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 10: Those who persecute the believing men and women and then do not repent will certainly suffer the punishment of Hell and the torment of burning. | ان الذين فتنوا المؤمنين والمؤمنات ثم لم يتوبوا فلهم عذاب جهنم ولهم عذاب الحريق

Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 11: Surely those who believe and do good will have Gardens under which rivers flow. That is the greatest triumph. | ان الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار ذلك الفوز الكبير
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 12: Indeed, the ˹crushing˺ grip of your Lord is severe. | ان بطش ربك لشديد
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 13: ˹For˺ He is certainly the One Who originates and resurrects ˹all˺. | انه هو يبدئ ويعيد
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 14: And He is the All-Forgiving, All-Loving— | وهو الغفور الودود
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 15: Lord of the Throne, the All-Glorious | ذو العرش المجيد
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 16: Doer of whatever He wills. | فعال لما يريد
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 17: Has the story of the ˹destroyed˺ forces reached you ˹O Prophet˺— | هل اتاك حديث الجنود
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 18: ˹the forces of˺ Pharaoh and Thamûd? | فرعون وثمود
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 19: Yet the disbelievers ˹still˺ persist in denial. | بل الذين كفروا في تكذيب
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 20: But Allah encompasses them from all sides. | والله من ورائهم محيط
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 21: In fact, this is a glorious Quran | بل هو قران مجيد
Surah 85 Al-Burooj, Ayah 22: ˹recorded˺ in a Preserved Tablet. | في لوح محفوظ
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 1: By the heaven and the nightly star! | والسماء والطارق
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 2: And what will make you realize what the nightly star is? | وما ادراك ما الطارق
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 3: ˹It is˺ the star of piercing brightness. | النجم الثاقب
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 4: There is no soul without a vigilant angel ˹recording everything˺. | ان كل نفس لما عليها حافظ
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 5: Let people then consider what they were created from! | فلينظر الانسان مم خلق
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 6: ˹They were˺ created from a spurting fluid | خلق من ماء دافق
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 7: stemming from between the backbone and the ribcage. | يخرج من بين الصلب والترائب
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 8: Surely He is fully capable of bringing them back ˹to life˺ | انه على رجعه لقادر
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 9: on the Day all secrets will be disclosed. | يوم تبلى السرائر
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 10: Then one will have neither power nor ˹any˺ helper. | فما له من قوة ولا ناصر
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 11: By the sky with its recurring cycles | والسماء ذات الرجع
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 12: and the earth with its sprouting plants! | والارض ذات الصدع
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 13: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a decisive word | انه لقول فصل
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 14: and is not to be taken lightly. | وما هو بالهزل
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 15: They are certainly devising ˹evil˺ plans | انهم يكيدون كيدا
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 16: but I too am planning. | واكيد كيدا
Surah 86 At-Taariq, Ayah 17: So bear with the disbelievers ˹O Prophet˺. Let them be for ˹just˺ a little while. | فمهل الكافرين امهلهم رويدا
Surah 87 Al-A'laa, Ayah 1: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High | سبح اسم ربك الاعلى
Surah 87 Al-A'laa, Ayah 2: Who created and ˹perfectly˺ fashioned ˹all˺ | الذي خلق فسوى
Surah 87 Al-A'laa, Ayah 3: and Who ordained precisely and inspired accordingly | والذي قدر فهدى
Surah 87 Al-A'laa, Ayah 4: and Who brings forth ˹green˺ pasture | والذي اخرج المرعى

Surah 87 Al-A'laa, Ayah 14: Successful indeed are those who purify themselves | قد افلح من تزكى

Surah 88 Al-Ghaashiya, Ayah 1: Has the news of the Overwhelming Event reached you ˹O Prophet˺? | هل اتاك حديث الغاشية

Surah 88 Al-Ghaashiya, Ayah 16: and ˹splendid˺ carpets spread out. | وزرابي مبثوثة
Surah 88 Al-Ghaashiya, Ayah 17: Do they not ever reflect on camels—how they were ˹masterfully˺ created; | افلا ينظرون الى الابل كيف خلقت
Surah 88 Al-Ghaashiya, Ayah 18: and the sky—how it was raised ˹high˺; | والى السماء كيف رفعت
